resources.string: GeoQuiz

Correct!
Incorrect!
1. The same server serves the whole game
2. Only the serving team can win a point
3. 1 attempt is allowed to get the serve into the correct box
4. If the ball hits the net, and goes into the correct box, the serve is repeated.
5. The first serve is always from the right side
6. Both teams/players move from side to side when a point is scored
7. Deuce is always served from the left
8. Two bounces are allowed on each side
9. Balls that land on the line are in
10. In the early game of tennis dead rodents were used instead of balls
